league.title: TRQPro league - Bitmex, Binance, Bybit
league.join-league-question: Do you want to join the league? Sign up and read the regulations
league.no-league-data-info: No active league or no first reading (12:30 UTC).

league-dialog.no-upcoming-leagues: No upcoming tournaments, check back later.
league-dialog.title: Do you want to join the league? Sign up now!
league-dialog.ref-requirements: The requirement of participation in the League is to set up an account from one of the following links:
league-dialog.league-desc-2: , just enter your api key to read the league account status (how to do this?*).
league-dialog.form-all-quarter-leagues-checkbox: Register me in all other leagues this quarter
league-dialog.bitmex-tutorial-rule-1: In the Name field, enter 'nick-from-Telegram' e.g. 'John',
league-dialog.bitmex-tutorial-rule-3: Key Permissions - here we select (-), neither 'Order' nor 'Order cancel is required',
league-dialog.bitmex-tutorial-rule-4: Leave the 'Withdraw' field blank, without change,
league-dialog.bitmex-tutorial-rule-5: Create a key and write the 'ID' and 'Secret' key for us (save 'Secret' in a safe place, you can only see it when creating the key!).
league-dialog.bybit-tutorial-rule-3: Enter your nickname in the 'Name' field,
league-dialog.bybit-tutorial-rule-4: Leave the 'Connect with IP' field blank, without change
league-dialog.bybit-tutorial-rule-5: In the 'Key permissions' field, select Active orders and positions,
league-dialog.binance-tutorial-rule-1: Enter the API key name, then click Create,
league-dialog.binance-tutorial-rule-3: Confirm key creation on your email,
league-dialog.binance-tutorial-rule-4: Click on the 'Edit restrictions' button to change the key permissions,
league-dialog.binance-tutorial-rule-5: Make sure only the Read Only and Enable Future boxes are checked
league-dialog.binance-tutorial-rule-6: Under the IP access restrictions section, select Unrestricted,
league-dialog.binance-tutorial-rule-7: The changes are saved with the button at the top Save,
league-dialog.binance-tutorial-rule-8: Copy API Key and Secret Key into the appropriate fields on the form, complete.
